content: get your hook ready for some crochet origami in this fun and very approachable pattern three simple squares come together to form a sturdy tote bag there s zero seaming very few ends to weave in and plenty of portable potential in this quick surprisingly-roomy bag you ll practice the skills of working in the round slip stitching and working basic increases and decreases this bag is perfect for an advanced beginner looking to level learn some new tips and tricks while this pattern calls for a worsted-weight category 4 mercerized cotton any sturdy yarn can be substituted if you choose a yarn of a different weight you can easily modify the bag size by making smaller or larger squares this ad-free printable pdf includes large-type written instructions and a detailed photo tutorial photos are separate from written pattern so you can choose to print them or conserve ink this pattern originally appeared on make & do crew skill level - beginner sizing/measurements - 18 5 wide when laying flat 21 drop from shoulder when worn easily adjustable with knot placement see additional details in overall pattern notes to determine sizing downloading - this listing is for the tradecraft tote crochet pattern pdf only pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment copyright/making finished items - thank you for sharing my patterns and tutorials when you do it helps support the blog and my ability to create more patterns which by the way i seriously love to do so really i mean it thank you you may make items to sell with this pattern/tutorial in exchange i ask that you link back to makeanddocrew com do not use my photos as your own sales photos do not distribute my patterns/templates as your own permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind return policy - as this is a digital product i do not offer returns and while you re at it can find all our free crochet bag patterns here 1 1 https //makeanddocrew com/tag/bag/
